website_summaries.verdict: A real trumpet for a great price. If you have problems, customer service for this company is top notch.
pros: Company does a good job of standing behind its product
cons: The trumpet sometimes has problems with the quality on the valves
However, the company customer service is very responsive in sending out replacements

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, solid durability, and unbeatable customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this trumpet for my 5th-grade son two years ago. Two years later, it has been a great purchase. The sound quality is great, it still looks spotless, and his band teacher has commented on how surprised he is regarding its quality and durability. Like other reviewers, we had an issue with a broken valve within the first 6 months, and the customer service was awesome. We had a brand new replacement trumpet - not just the valve - sent to us within a week. It has performed flawlessly since. We highly recommend this trumpet to any beginner or student musician. The quality is great and we saved hundreds versus renting one for two years.
customer_reviews.author: N. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful and extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: we ordered this trumpet for my son in oct. In feb. my son hit the spit valve on his music stand and the screw and spring was lost. I called the company the priority shipped him a brand new piece including the tube that holds the spit valve. He told me if i couldnt fix it he would ship it to repair center at no cost to me and get us taking care of right away. The man was very understanding and and was very polite. My sons trumpet is fixed now and back to new.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: This is a real trumpet for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research for my child in band. Wanted to buy a trumpet online to save money (instead of renting). I know what you are looking for. I know you're afraid that this is a toy, not an instrument. This is it. This is a real trumpet for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Begora

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good deal. Considering the cheapest "cheapo" trumpets I've found locally on craigslist were $200, I consider this trumpet a good buy. It sounds just as good as the entry level Yamaha we were renting for a rip off price of $900 ($400 rental fee!!!). That being said, my son noticed several flaws in the Jean Paul right away: imperfections in the finish around, very rough edges on the valves (my son explained it as "it feels crusty when I press it"), felt looked like they were about to fall out. None of these problems could be found on the $500 valued yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Joishua Lau

customer_reviews.title: Great product & great service
customer_reviews.text: This seller is serious and with a great customer service. I had a small problem with my trumpet and I decided to contact them to get further information and to know what to do in my specific situation. They solved my problem immediately. As a trumpet player for many years, I bought this trumpet for my boy who is new playing trumpet. The price-quality ratio of this product is fabulous. I strongly recommend this brand for the quality and the excellent customer service they have.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Liot

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great trumpet. The school music teacher was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this trumpet a year and a half ago for our 12 year old son. This has been a great trumpet. The school music teacher was a little snooty about an online purchase of an unknown brand, but she changed her "tune" upon hearing and seeing the instrument. Our son was delighted and has really enjoyed the trumpet. He just returned from band camp and loves his instrument. Additionally, our son dented the 2nd slide valve. I contacted Jean Paul about a replacement part, they answered the phone, had me send a photo of the part and the same day had the part shipped to me without charge! Wow, great service from a bargain purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teacher had major problems with it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson started middle school band this year. I bought this trumpet because of reviews and I thought it would, from its reviews, be a better instrument than a rental. I have gotten the information, admittedly secondhand, that the teacher had major problems with the valves sticking, going so far as to say some really not nice things about it. I just bought my grandson a new TR-430 which not only sounds better and is easier for my grandson to play, but the teacher says is a much better instrument. Now what to do with the 330, the school does not want it.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Great Instrument
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 5th year playing the Trumpet & honestly, I find nothing wrong with this instrument. I was rather worried about it because of the price (cheap instruments aren't always good) but so far, so amazing!!! I feel as if my tone & just volume is getting better with this instrument than my last, but that one was older of course. Definitely perfect for beginners. I will keep this review updated as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Bailee

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This Trumpet is my daughter's first and has been great. She had lost a bottom valve cap and I contacted jeanpaulusa.com. They sent a new cap along with extra pieces at no charge. Great customer service 👍!! I will use them again
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, especially for the price. It's much better than a rental instrument. If my grandson decides to practice more and wants to continue playing when he gets older I'll help him buy something different. For marching band and playing in the school pep band this trumpet will be first choice. I don't know how the case will wear after being loaded on a school bus or stuffed in a locker .I majored in music in college, taught instrumental music, and still play my trombone every once in awhile. I'm wondering about the quality of this company's trombones.
customer_reviews.author: M. Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but that didn't last!
customer_reviews.text: After two months, the keys started sticking so badly that even the band teacher couldn't fix them. Ugh! It went right on a shelf and my daughter had to start using the schools rental trumpet again. So irritating!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Please forgive my lack of musical terms. It's my daughter's beginner band instrument. This purchase was a mistake. The trumpet frustrated her beyond the learning process. The button keeps sticking so that she has to pull it up to keep playing. The instrument gets a rattle sound when played for 15 minutes without cleaning. She has to clean it 3 times a practice session and cannot play the proper notes without having to stop (messing up the timing) and pull the levers back up. Bad instrument/bad purchase. She hates the trumpet and wants to quit band because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Swarthout

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase of a good trumpet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this trumpet. This is the third brand I've tried and I'm finally happy with my purchase. The one year warranty helps to know in knowing I can return it if there are issues. So far, no sticky valves like I hear about with other brands and have experienced. Student level like I need. When I'm ready to move up, I'll check out the TR-430.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Claude

customer_reviews.title: Returned to the trumpet in my 40s and this was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had not played trumpet with any regularity since high school. I wanted to pick it back up again, but I did not want to invest a fortune in it. Mostly I play for myself, but occasionally with and for others at church. This is exactly the horn I needed. Playing a trumpet again after decades away is HARD, but with time and practice, me and this little trumpet are sounding pretty good. I'm extremely happy with it and cannot imagine getting any more bang for my buck. (A note to others picking the trumpet back up- Don't be discouraged. You are going to sound like trash for a while, but with regular practice it comes back. I promise.)
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought this Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: I am a 72 year old trombone player who always wanted to play trumpet. So, rather than put hundreds or thousands into an instrument that may or may not be played, I found this trumpet on Amazon and couldn't be more pleased with the value ($200). Shortly after I received my new TR 330N, I asked a friend who plays trumpet to try it out and tell me what he thought. He was impressed with the quality and responsiveness of this Jean Paul instrument. For him it was comparable to much more expensive professional trumpets he has owned. Young or old, you can't go wrong with this beautiful trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Student Trumpet For Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trumpet for my son. He is in beginners 6th grade band. His teacher was even impressed with the quality. The trumpet worked great for the first six months. Then one of the valves did not function properly. I contacted the seller and he was very helpful and responded promptly to my email. He was kind enough to replace my trumpet with a brand new one. I would recommend this trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: subodh

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet -- My son has excelled for 3 years with this trumpet
customer_reviews.text: When my son started playing the trumpet in 4th grade, we were not able to judged the quality of trumpets or meaningfully compare costs. He has played for 3 years now, done very well, and this trumpet has served him well. I am open and clear about problems or things that could be improved, but we've seen neither with this trumpet -- this trumpet has been great for a grade A music student through 7th grade and we recommend it for everyone without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: David the Chemist

customer_reviews.title: Jean Paul TR-330 Standard Student Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: I am 81 years old and haven't played trumpet (cornet) since freshman yr. My lip not quite there yet so this was a great horn for me. It is a beautiful instrument and very good for the price. No defects,has a good sound, all the valves and slides work fine. Would recommend for student or an old codger like me wanting to try again. .
customer_reviews.author: Howard Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and more than we expected!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is joining band for the first time this year. He is in 8th grade. We checked around with some local music shops and also read about a few on Amazon and decided on this one. I'm so glad we went with it because it is really nice and perfect for him to start with and learn and I'm sure he will use it awhile before we upgrade to the next one. This company from what I've read was amazing and I'm so glad to know they are there for our needs. I called in with a question and the man was very helpful and knowledgeable. I recommend this for anyone looking for a nice trumpet!
customer_reviews.author: mkimb

customer_reviews.title: Rich sounding beginner/intermediate trumpet with backpack case.
customer_reviews.text: Wanting a trumpet to serve my 11 year old's early years and middle school potential marching band years, I think this Jean Paul TR-330 is a great fit. Pros: Rich Sound and projection. Backpack trumpet case. Shiny brass finish. With mouthpiece. Smooth valves. Cons: Wish it had come with a starter maintenance pack, easier way to signup for warranty via website, and online video on how to keep the trumpet in best shape for future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: For a second-year trumpet student like my son, this is an EXCELLENT trumpet. We actually saved money buying this one instead of renting for the year! And if he decides to move to another instrument (or none at all) next year, we'll probably sell if for nearly what we paid! I recently had an issue where the 2nd valve stem was sticking down due to a bent valve stem, and Jean Paul repaired it at no cost (except shipping)! Great company to deal with. For a beginner or intermediate player, don't seek out Yamaha or other brands - you'll end up paying twice as much and getting the same!
customer_reviews.author: Bret Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and trumpet!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! I purchased this trumpet for my daughter and after two months of gentle use, one of the valves broke making the trumpet unusable. I went to the Jean Paul USA web site and sent an email to support@jeanpaulusa.com explaining the situation. I received a personal email back from Josh within hours. He thanked me for contacting them and wrote, "We'll get this fixed and make it right!" My new trumpet is on the way! Sometimes a product, no matter what it is, may have a defect. Josh at Jean Paul USA, acted quickly to solve the problem. The trumpet is great, has terrific sound, and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Trumpet!
customer_reviews.text: I am not Katherine, I am her son and I just started band. I needed a trumpet that was good quality and good for a beginner. I found this trumpet and it came on time and was in great shape. I am very happy with this trumpet and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kazuko

customer_reviews.title: Great first trumpet!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous buying an instrument online but to be honest this thing is high-quality and sounds great especially for our beginner trumpet player. If you’re in the market and looking for an affordable trumpet for your child to start off with I would highly recommend this one. The case is very sturdy and comes with everything you need to get started
customer_reviews.author: Preston G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, she loves it. It sounds good. I did have an issue after washing the trumpet. I called customer service and spoke with Enrique who was able to help me. I was assured if there was anything wrong with the trumpet it would get fixed. But it was good to go. Great product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Persi A. Asencio

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TR 330 Trumpet for my son and is a good Trumpet, tried others but he likes this one the best and affordable as well.. had a small issue and called customer service and they resolved quickly and without hesitation.. Thank You..
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Trumpet for High School Musician
customer_reviews.text: Two years ago, my son had to upgrade to a larger trumpet, and he opted for a Jean Paul TR-330. It has seen him throughout the majority of his high school marching band performances without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Anglon

customer_reviews.title: Value is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best way to buy an instrument for school is through amazon!!! Saved a fortune! Very nice trumpet and case! Perfect for a first time user!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: great trumpet for the price
customer_reviews.text: my daughter used this for elementary band. her teacher said it had a great sound. So i think it's definitely worth it. she will continue to use it up through middle school and if she decides to stay in band we may purchase a better/ newer one at that time. but this is a great starter instrument.
customer_reviews.author: boumel

customer_reviews.title: Tone, durability and value
customer_reviews.text: After listening to a couple of folks playing this instrument I was sold. The TR330N is a superb instrument for my rough and tumble son. It’s durable enough to take moderate abuse and the price is such that I don’t cringe when he takes it out of the case. Best part is the tone. It sounds wonderful. One of the plastic valve guides was damaged beyond use. I looked around for a replacement part and ended up contacting Jean Paul customer support. The nice folks are sending me gratis replacement guides. Dont buy new guides, just give them a call first!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I don't know crap about musical instruments
customer_reviews.text: I don't know crap about musical instruments, but my 15 year old daughter loves it. She is in the high school band and uses it every day. No complaints from her at all and we all know how much 15 year olds love to complain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Detwiler

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service from Jean Paul
customer_reviews.text: Good trumpet for a beginner. We had no problems with it for 1.5 years. Then a valve guide broke this week. Contacted the company, and within hours they mailed a replacement part for free! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Its light and good for young kids
customer_reviews.text: After renting an expansive brand for more than a year we thought of having a personal one and my son played both instruments for a while and he couldn't feel any difference as a young learner. He actually thought its better because its lighter and has brand new shinny look too :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 40 year old trumpet playing husband. He played and high school and college and wanted to play again after his was long worn out. I looked at a lot of reviews and did my research. He loved it! Very well made. Sound quality is equal to more expensive options. Carrying bag is perfect to store in. No need to spend extra money this is perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa S. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Good For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine trumpet for a beginning student that will probably last through High School (providing a standard program track). It’s also a good pick up for purveyors of other instruments, such as myself, who simply want to expand their arsenal. However, if you’re looking for a professional level trumpet, this is not the correct choice. Always check with a trumpet player before purchasing a trumpet!
customer_reviews.author: JPTimpani

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely a good starter trumpet
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a good starter trumpet, and for the price, you cant go wrong with it. In terms of comparing it to a "professional" trumpet, the best way to describe playing this trumpet is that it feels congested.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good looking student trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Trumpet arrived as expected and my grandson loves it! It was missing the valve oil so I emailed Jean Paul customer service and that was beautifully resolved the same day! I am very impressed with customer service. I might add to this after he has played the trumpet for a few months?
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Valves stick even when oiled and cleaned. After 6 months all 3 valves are stuck. Seems like a norm after a couple months with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is still having problems with the valves sticking ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is still having problems with the valves sticking, her teacher has tried to look at it. Is there anything that can be done?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter is very happy with her new instrument
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to start playing a second instrument to expand her musical experience and wanted something different from playing her drums, glockenspiel, and other percussion instruments so, she chose the trumpet and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Malvitz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing! Got this trumpet to replace old and outdated trumpet for my child. It is a wonderful trumpet! Came in a decent case although we had a different case but had no issues with it fitting in the other case! It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Studjo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My son is using this for intermediate middle school band saving us a ton of money on the rental. The band director was pleased with the tone. It sounded just like the $800 trumpet from the rental shop. We are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baynon

customer_reviews.title: To be looked at, not used.
customer_reviews.text: My son is extremely responsible and this trumpet has already had a loose valve and now a broken main slide. It looks great but is poorly produced and not really designed to last at all. He has had it for 4 months and it is completely falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The best trumpet, backed my a great company.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, who just started trumpet. It was so easy for him to handle, and it was better quality than any of the other trumpets out there. It sounds wonderful. My son uses the trumpet for Jazz band, marching band, and symphonic band, it is criisp. The customer service is outstanding, and Jean Paul backs their product up with a great service warranty second to none. I just chatted with Josh at customer service live chat, (10/09/17) and he was quick, curtious, and very pleasant to work over the internet with. I will buy all my instruments from them. I highly reccomend this company for all your music needs(at least trumpets)
customer_reviews.author: diane clothier

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A good trumpet for beginners, especially at the price. The nickel coding is more durable than the brass in terms of scratch resistance. Very pleased with this purchase for my fifth grader.
customer_reviews.author: W. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Broken valves
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail and upon trying it out there was no sound, i think there is something wrong with the valves. I was so excited about this but ended up being so disappointed that its unplayable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Enrique, was amazing! My sons valve broke on his trumpet and he was pretty upset that he would be missing band until we talked to Enrique. He answered right away and had our issues resolved within 10 minutes, they are sending us a new trumpet since we can't get to them to have them install the part needed. Thanks Enrique from the both of us
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: ... sent this to my granddaughter and she is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my granddaughter and she is very happy with it. She is in the 6th grade and just started playing an instrument. This is perfect for a beginner. She is now "1st chair" so I guess it sounds sufficient as well.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was worth the money. The last trumpet for my daughter had horrible valves and needed oiling multiple times a day just to work. This trumpet hasn't had any issues
customer_reviews.author: Chevonne Llamas

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not as good as a $2000 trumpet, but a beginner will never know. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. There was one sticky valve, but it fixed itself after use. Great, great value for a beginner. Unless you are an experienced trumpeter you will have a hard time justifying $2000 for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: tech boo

customer_reviews.title: Regularly maintaining it will keep it in good shape. The Nickel look is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, it’s affordable and perfect for a first trumpet. My son plays in middle school band and the Jazz band. This horn is solid. One day I will buy him a Bach, for now this will do. The nickel is slightly tarnishing so definitely polish it and keep it clean regularly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steak&Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.😣
customer_reviews.text: My son is very frustrated about this instrument. He is having trouble with it most of the time. Loosen screws, doesn't sound good. He is not happy at all. I bought this before school started. By the time he started using it, I wasn't able to return it. I am very disappointed.😣
customer_reviews.author: Mama Harry

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my11 year old son Who started trumpet Lessons 2 months ago returned the rental trumpet bought this on Amazon his trumpet instructor says it is a nice trumpet
customer_reviews.author: RANDY

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: The trumpet has been a great purchase, my son uses it everyday in band and it has worked good and sounds great. I emailed the support center because i needed a replacement part a small plastic piece and they responded back to me the same day. They are sending me the part for free. I would recommend the trumpet to others, because it's affordable and a great trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought JP TR-330 for my son who started learning to play trumpet it as his second musical instrument. I did a research in the internet and found good recommendations to the TR 330 for beginners/intermediate students and decided to order on Amazon. My son does like it a lot- it is quite easy to use. We are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5th grader as his first instrument. Sounds great to me, although have had issues with one of the valves sticking despite regular maintenance and attention.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny 8675309

customer_reviews.title: Bad valve
customer_reviews.text: the first valve is sticking. tried valve oil, the problem is with the spring. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying this for your beginner. Update The Customer Service is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is over the moon with his trumpet. He is in beginners 6th grade band. His teacher was even impressed with the quality. He was afraid it was it would be more like a toy. The first thing he said was,”It’s not a toy!” They have prompt, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice to enough for beginner
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet for my 14 years old son. He is beginner. It is very nice to enough for beginner.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Came Apart
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son 4 months ago. He will be starting marching band next month. It has come apart. I sent it off to be repaired and the repair cost is $144.00!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying relearning trumpet after many many many years ago... Perhaps I should have gotten the adjustable finger ring for my left hand. Evidently my hands were smaller when I was 12.
customer_reviews.author: Darin22skidoo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a high-school band and after 4 years of renting an instrument i decided to invest in one. I looked around and found this one, the jean paul tr-330. And I'm so relieved to say it was totally worth the 200. its a great option for a trumpet with exceptional quality
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this trumpet for my daughter's 6th grade beginners band class. She loved it! She used it everyday at school and without any problems. Even the case that it came with survived 6th grade. She started camp for marching band this month. Last week during band camp one of the valves started turning n sometimes sticking. Called and told them(Jean Paul) what was going on and all I can say is ...WOW! Their customer service is amazing. They back their product 110%!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He's only a second year but he can already tell a big difference in quality of manufacture and sound from his last trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product and items that came with it for the price. Going to be used by a beginner and to see the thrilling look on his face when he received it is priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: RetiredGrannaT

customer_reviews.title: Trumpet sounds good and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Had for about a month - so far, so good. Trumpet sounds good and arrived quickly. The zipper was a little stiff on the carrying case, but seemed to loosen up over time. Bought the item since their customer service reviews were good. Just registered the item for the warranty as well. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Green

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument for a beginner. The valves do sometimes stick but easy to clean and get working again. Purchased this to replace the relic my son was using from a flea market.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Customer service from ENRIQUE at Jean Paul is first class
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVE his TR 330 purchased in October of 2018. The finger hook came off and I contacted Jean Paul and spoke with Enrique. He is AMAZING!! CUSTOMER SERVICE FIRST CLASS. He asked that I send it back and he will have it done in a day and get it back to us. WE ARE STICKING TO JEAN PAUL NO OTHER! #1 for us!
customer_reviews.author: allison matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a beginner's trumpet and the student loves it. The carrying case is a huge bonus! It's fabric and formed. It has a shoulder strap as well. It looks good and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Cicero

customer_reviews.title: Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this instrument. Her band director was iffy about it because it was not the one that he recommended, but my daughter has first chair. So I guess we can say it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: valves felt a little bit stiffer that I would have liked. The real problem is that the horn would ...
customer_reviews.text: Was really impressed when I first received the horn... Decent quality, valves felt a little bit stiffer that I would have liked. The real problem is that the horn would be in tune on the lower octive, but too sharp on the upper registry, and it had no more adjustment. I play a flugel horn so I know I am not the cause, and even used the same mouth piece to be sure... No dice, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A

customer_reviews.title: Short-Lived Investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trumpet on September 26, 2016 as a beginner instrument for my son. Soon after he started playing it, one of the valves started sticking and prevented him from being able to play properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: This is not a bad trumpet for the dollars
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad trumpet for the dollars.It does not have a bad sound. I bought it as a fun instrument and it brought me back to playing one like I did a long time ago. Only one issue with a sticky third valve, but the customer service took care of this with one e-mail. Sent out a new one, really easy to deal with. So if you were ever curious about playing the trumpet, give this one a try
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Renewed happiness!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trumpet for my son to replace a corner he used to have as a kid. He loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad El

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument
customer_reviews.text: Great product and well put together. Sounds great and my son's director even said it's a great instrument. Would recommend for beginner or to and avid player
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Tennicott

customer_reviews.title: Really good product and the customer service is great
customer_reviews.text: Really good product and the customer service is great. It comes with a warranty as well. Definitely something that would work great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Werner

customer_reviews.title: You just cant beat this price for a brand new ...
customer_reviews.text: You just cant beat this price for a brand new trumpet for your junior higher to learn on. The local music store is gouging the local community by rent-to-own out their old used $1,500.00 trumpets at $35.00 a month! This was a no brainier and I used a $70 rewards and got it for $110.00.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The Jean Paul company has excellent customer service every time I called. They stand behind their products 100%! I really appreciate all of their help and no questions asked coverage on warranty.
customer_reviews.author: JANE LIN

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After 1/2 year my son's trumpets valve became sticky.... Jean Paul stood behind their product and have given a full replacement. My son will be able to be up and running again quickly. Thanks for the kind and polite service.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boy is in middle school and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Kopp

customer_reviews.title: I got this TR-330 for my birthday and love playing the trumpet
customer_reviews.text: I got this TR-330 for my birthday and love playing the trumpet. I played as a teenager and now want to get back into it. But, a couple valves have been sticking lately and I called the support@ Jean Paul and the service call was way above what I expected. After informing them of my problem they quickly told me they will replace the instrument. I am very pleased with the attention given to me. Very professional and informed. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Patton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality and finishing
customer_reviews.text: The build quality, fit and finishing are excellent, and the tone produced is quite nice. The carrying case is also quite nice, especially given the price. Great value overall.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner trumphet. It is working great for my son in 6th grade. It is a beautiful instrument that comes with everything you need to play and maintain. Especially the nice case since it comes back and forth from school a lot. I wanted to add that their customer service is amazing. They back their products 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy LaGreco

customer_reviews.title: For the price very good
customer_reviews.text: Just starting back learning to play and didn't want to spend a lot of money and this trumpet is perfect...great case and quality ...highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: gary a thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good Horns For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well made with very good tone and fluid playability. The valves and slides work well, the horns look great, and the sound/resonance exceeds my expectations. I'd compare it favorably to my first Yamaha Student horn which I used for a number of years. Quite happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KRIS L VAN LIEW

customer_reviews.title: Compared to my silver Blessing, it's perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beginner trumpet. I got it for my daughter, and she had loved it ever since. Sounds great, and the valves work just like my old 1200 dollar silver Blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Dotrot

customer_reviews.title: Great First Step
customer_reviews.text: Started taking trumpet lessons and I am realizing a dream come true
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha Price

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this trumpet for my 5thgrade child who is beginning band. Wonderful sound, band teacher was impressed at quality given the price. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: VG33

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The trumpet is of surprising quality for the price. Smooth operation, simple maintenance and very nice sound. Our daughter enjoys playing it and her music teacher was also impressed with the instrument. We are quite pleased, thank you
customer_reviews.author: bornagain1

customer_reviews.title: Fast, responsive, and impressive after the sale support and service.
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument for our middle school son. We had a small piece in a valve guide break and reached out to Jean Paul via their website and couldn't be happier with the response. They are sending out spare parts immediately at no charge without question. Way to stand behind your products and make loyal customers.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and excellent price. I was pleasantly surprised. Definitely great for beginners/students and someone like me, who wanted to pick up the trumpet again after a few decades.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: Very cost efficient and sounds good. Not very durable because the finger pieces fall off. I have to pay to re mold on
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is in the 5th grade and he just started band. The music teacher was impressed and it works great for him without having to make the expensive monthly payments on an instrument.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great starter trumpet.
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great trumpet for my ten year old.
customer_reviews.author: happily-married-08

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Horn!
customer_reviews.text: This horn is awesome! for the money it plays very nice and has good tone! Nice kit for an intermediate to advanced player! I love this horn! LB
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd W. Beeby Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument
customer_reviews.text: My son has used this all school year. He loves it and sounds great no issues besides the maintenance care.
customer_reviews.author: heatshar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Excellent customer service. I bought my 4th grader a trumpet. It shipped fast and he was super happy with it. Great quality and a perfect first instrument. 5mos in, he had a mishap and broke the instrument. No hassle replacement being sent, we just pay shipping. That is pretty amazing. Simple process and fast service.
customer_reviews.author: KYMS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. After a lot of use, one of the valve pieces broke. Support responded within a few hours and the replacement part + extras arrived super fast. Can't find a better deal for a trumpet anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Flinstone

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Trumpet sounds great. And they have great customer support. I had a sticky valve in my trumpet and they corrected the issue right away. Josh from Jean Paul USA was extremely helpful. I wish more companies had customer service like Jean Paul USA!
customer_reviews.author: kevcross7

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Not worth what you pay for. Might as well invest more for long term or even short term investment....
customer_reviews.author: Blue & Silver

product_meta.title: Jean Paul USA TR-330 Standard Student Trumpet
product_meta.description: Style:TR-330| Configuration:Trumpet onlyThe Jean Paul USA trumpet offers students an opportunity to learn a band instrument at an affordable price. The TR-330 trumpet provides a generous bore that makes playing easy and helps beginning band students hit notes accurately. The rose brass lead pipe construction helps produce warm tones that are well centered. The same lead pipe and bell also contribute to great sound projection so you'll be heard when you're performing in the school band practice room or outside in the marching band.
feature_bullets: The Jean Paul Trumpet is in key of Bb
Comes with robust contoured carrying case for ease of use transportation
Beautiful Yellow brass body construction with Gold Lacquer finish
Included Accessories: Carrying Case, Valve Oil, Gloves, Cleaning Cloth, and Mouthpiece

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars573 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
